Billing Agreements:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.

Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.

Acorduri facturare: Specifies what the Order Valid Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

Billing Agreements: The default number of child authorizations in your PayPal account is 1. To do multiple authorizations please contact PayPal to request an increase.
Acorduri facturare: Numărul implicit de autorizații secundare în contul dumneavoastră PayPal este de 1. Pentru crearea de autorizații multiple, contactați PayPal pentru solicitarea unei creșteri.

Billing Agreements: If this option is enabled, customer can change shipping address and shipping method on PayPal website. In live mode works via HTTPS protocol only.
Acorduri facturare: Dacă această opțiune este activată, clientul poate schimba adresa și modalitatea de livrare pe website-ul PayPal. în modulul live, funcționează numai prin protocoale HTTPS.

Billing Agreements: Notice that PayPal can handle up to 10 shipping options. That is why Magento will transfer only first 10 cheapest shipping options if there are more than 10 available.
Acorduri facturare: Observați că PayPal poate suporta până la 10 opțiuni de livrare. De aceea Magento va transfera numai cele mai ieftine 10 opțiuni de livrare, dacă există mai mult de 10 opțiuni disponibile.

Billing Agreements: Ability for buyer to purchase without PayPal account.
Acorduri facturare: Posibilitatea clientului de a achiziționa fără cont PayPal.
Solicitați adresa de facturare a clientului.

Billing Agreements: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.
Acorduri facturare: Această caracteristică trebuie să fie activată întâi pentru contul comerciantului prin suport tehnic PayPal.

Billing Agreements: Whether to create a billing agreement, if there are no active billing agreements available.
Acorduri facturare: Se poate crea un acord de facturare dacă nu sunt acorduri active de facturare disponibile.

Billing Agreements: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.
Acorduri facturare: Comercianții trebuie să aplice pentru PayPal pentru activarea caracteristicii de acorduri de facturare. Nu activați această opțiune înainte ca PayPal să confirme că acordurile de facturare sunt activate pentru contul dumneavoastră de comerciant.

Billing Agreements: Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.
Acorduri facturare: Va apărea ca opțiune de plată numai pentru clienții care au cel puțin un acord activ de facturare.
Nume gazdă punct final personalizat sau Adresă IP

Billing Agreements: Use colon to specify port. For example: "test.example.com:5224".
Acorduri facturare: Utilizați coloana pentru specificarea portului. De exemplu: "test.example.com:5224".
PayPal stochează rapoartele pentru 45 de zile.

Billing Agreements: Displays on catalog pages and homepage.
Acorduri facturare: Afișări pe paginile de catalog și pagina principală.

Billing Agreements: Allowable values: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (a custom payment page style from your merchant account profile).
Acorduri facturare: Valori admise: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (un stil de pagină de plată personalizat din profilul contului de comerciant).

Billing Agreements: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.
Acorduri facturare: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.

Billing Agreements: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.
Acorduri facturare: Culoarea de fundal pentru antetul de pe pagina de checkout. Cod culoare hexazecimal HTML de 6 cifre și majuscule în ASCII.
Perimetru de 2-pixeli în jurul spațiului de antet.

Billing Agreements: The background color for the checkout page around the header and payment form.
Acorduri facturare: Culoare fundal pentru pagina de checkout în jurul antetului și formularului de plată.

Billing Agreements: The installment feature is available only in these locales: en_MX, es_MX, en_BR, pt_BR.
Acorduri facturare: The installment feature is available only in these locales: en_MX, es_MX, en_BR, pt_BR.

Billing Agreements:
PayPal will automatically display each enabled funding option to eligible buyers.
                                For example, PayPal Credit is only shown to buyers in countries where PayPal Credit is
                                offered and the currency offered by the merchant is USD.
Acorduri facturare:
PayPal will automatically display each enabled funding option to eligible buyers.
                                For example, PayPal Credit is only shown to buyers in countries where PayPal Credit is
                                offered and the currency offered by the merchant is USD.

Billing Agreements: Accept payments with a PCI-compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)
Acorduri facturare: Accept payments with a PCI-compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)

Billing Agreements: PayPal recommends that you set up an additional User on your account at manager.paypal.com
Acorduri facturare: PayPal recomandă înscrierea unui utilizator suplimentar pe contul dumneavoastră la manager.paypal.com

Billing Agreements: PayPal recommends you set up an additional User on your account at manager.paypal.com, instead of entering your admin username and password here. This will enhance your security and prevent service interruptions if you later change your password. If you do not want to set up an additional User, you can re-enter your Merchant Login here.
Acorduri facturare: PayPal recomandă înscrierea unui utilizator suplimentar pe contul dumneavoastră la manager.paypal.com, în locul introducerii unui nume de utilizator cu drepturi de administrator și parolă aici. Acest lucru va spori securitatea dumneavoastră și va preveni întreruperile serviciului dacă vă schimbați parola ulterior. Dacă nu doriți să înscrieți un utilizator suplimentar, puteți reintroduce datele de conectare comerciant aici.

Billing Agreements:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.
Acorduri facturare:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.
Setări de bază - Plăți avansate PayPal

Billing Agreements: It is recommended to set this value to "Debit or Credit Card" per store views.
Acorduri facturare: Se recomandă să setați valoarea la "Card de Credit sau Debit" pe vizualizare de magazin.

Billing Agreements: URL method for Cancel URL and Return URL
Acorduri facturare: Modalitate URL pentru Anulare URL și Restituire URL

Billing Agreements: Connect your merchant account with a PCI-compliant gateway that lets customers pay without leaving your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)
Acorduri facturare: Connect your merchant account with a PCI-compliant gateway that lets customers pay without leaving your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)
Link Debit de Plată și Checkout Expres

Billing Agreements: If you do not have multiple users set up on your account, please re-enter your Vendor/Merchant Login here.
Acorduri facturare: Dacă aveți utilizatori multipli încriși pe contul dumneavoastră, reintroduceți datele de conectare la contul de Furnizor/Comerciant aici.
Setări de bază - Link Debit de Plată PayPal

Billing Agreements: Accept payments with a PCI compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)
Acorduri facturare: Accept payments with a PCI compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)

Acorduri facturare: Afișați Checkout Expres în pasul de Informații Plată

Acorduri facturare: Soluție Plăți Pro Găzduite Website și Checkout Expres

Billing Agreements: Connect your merchant account with a fully customizable gateway that lets customers pay without leaving your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)
Acorduri facturare: Connect your merchant account with a fully customizable gateway that lets customers pay without leaving your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)

Billing Agreements: Supporting of American Express cards require additional agreement. Learn more at http://www.paypal.com/amexupdate.
Acorduri facturare: Acceptarea cardurilor American Express necesită un acord suplimentar. Mai multe detalii la http://www.paypal.com/amexupdate.

Billing Agreements: Be sure to configure Fraud Management Filters in your PayPal account in "Service Settings/Fraud Protection" section. Attention! Please don't use Total Purchase Price Ceiling/Floor Filters. Current integration doesn't support them.
Acorduri facturare: Be sure to configure Fraud Management Filters in your PayPal account in "Service Settings/Fraud Protection" section. Attention! Please don't use Total Purchase Price Ceiling/Floor Filters. Current integration doesn't support them.
